channel.title: CVE Feed for Horner Automation -- Cscape Envision RV
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Horner Automation -- Cscape Envision RV

item.title: CVE-2023-0623|2024-08-02T05:17:50.182Z -- horner%20automation -- cscape%20envision%20rv
item.description: Cscape Envision RV version 4.60 is vulnerable to an out-of-bounds write vulnerability when parsing project (i.e. HMI) files. The product lacks proper validation of user-supplied data, which could result in writes past the end of allocated data structures. An attacker could leverage these vulnerabilities to execute arbitrary code in the context of the current process.

item.title: CVE-2023-0622|2024-08-02T05:17:50.277Z -- horner%20automation -- cscape%20envision%20rv

item.title: CVE-2023-0621|2024-08-02T05:17:50.240Z -- horner%20automation -- cscape%20envision%20rv
item.description: Cscape Envision RV version 4.60 is vulnerable to an out-of-bounds read vulnerability when parsing project (i.e. HMI) files. The product lacks proper validation of user-supplied data, which could result in reads past the end of allocated data structures. An attacker could leverage these vulnerabilities to execute arbitrary code in the context of the current process.
